title: Role of the endosomal sorting machinery in controlling AMPA receptor trafficking in the hippocampus
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The purpose of this award was to establish international collaboration with Brazil. The main outcome of this project was knowledge exchange and development of new skills and expertise. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText:
The objectives of this grant were a) to establish collaborations with the University of Sao Paulo in Brazil, and b) to collect preliminar data to prepare a full application.
We have achieved both of the these aims. In fact, we have applied for a BBSRC/FAPESP Bilateral proposal, which was submitted to the BBSRC(BB/L001381/1) in January/2013. 
As this proposal was not funded, we are further collecting preliminary data and we will re-submit a propsal to the BBSRC or MRC in 2015. This was a pump-priming grant. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
